Texts.Chs: 某种成分不明的液体被包裹在不稳定的基因结构中，我想这可以用于基因研究工程中！
Texts.Eng: Erratic gene-constructs encased in liquified...something. Let's jam it into a gene-research project!

Texts.Chs: 只需一眼我就能保证这种诱变源极度致命。它不仅有着极强的毒性，甚至还有更多未知的危害。
Texts.Eng: I can tell at a glance that this mutagen will prove lethal if you touch it. It has high-potency toxins and who knows what else?

Texts.Chs: 护根可以作为低档次的肥料使用。投入水培托盘中可以促进作物生长并增加产量。
Texts.Eng: Mulch has one single purpose: Low-grade fertilizer. Toss it into a Hydroponics Tray to increase crop yields and growth speed.

Texts.Chs: 你的样本收集罐中装着古怪的诱变源。它肯定是能派上用场的。
Texts.Eng: Strange mutagenic material swirling in your sample jar. Surely we can use this somehow.

Texts.Chs: 这古怪外星混合物中的基因密码中混杂着许多不明的元素，看看我们能在实验室能发现些什么。
Texts.Eng: This strange alien compound has various unknown elements within its genetic coding. We should see what it can do in the lab.

Texts.Chs: 你最终合成了一种全新的金属！我们应该称它为异极合金。得益于你渊博的化学知识，我想它一定很棒。
Texts.Eng: Using your chemistry mastery you have managed to create a whole new type of metal. We shall call it: Morphite. I bet its awesome, since you made it.

Texts.Chs: 这种不稳定的粒子将会起到十分大的作用，可用于制造极其先进的机械及设备。
Texts.Eng: What we have here in Unstable Particles is a very useful and advanced material capable of creating extremely advanced machines and equipment.

Texts.Chs: 这种闻起来就像腐烂水果的物质腐化一切与其接触的有机物，请不要食用。
Texts.Eng: Whatever this is, it smells like pandas and fruit yet erodes all organic matter it touches. Don't eat it.

Texts.Chs: 你成功的将腐化生物质诱变为了一种有用的矿石。可是……它能做什么呢？
Texts.Eng: You've successfully mutated raw corruption into a useable sort of ore. I wonder what it can do?
